scripts.dev: npm run seed && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: eslint . --fix && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.ci: npm ci && npm run ci:frontend && npm run ci:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:env
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && npm run seed && playwright test
